name: Snazzy
headline: Making clear aligners accessible and affordable in India
description: Snazzy is a teledentistry platform for teeth straightening. Our goal is to democratize access to affordable and accessible clear aligner treatment. We leverage teledentistry and offer the highest quality aligners at a fraction of what others charge.

founders.name: Ayush Pateria, Founder
founders.description: Hacker and entrepreneur. Building the future of teeth straightening.

# You want straighter teeth? We straighten teeth.
Our all-day teeth aligners deliver fast results for a smile you'll love.
Avg. Treatment
6
Months
Daily Wear
22
Hours
[Get Started](https://snazzy.in/</get-snazzy>)
## Better treatment starts here
Snazzy aligners are **invisible,** and made from best-in-class material, making the treatment **painless.** Every aligner is **designed for you by expert orthodontists** who works with you at every step of your journey, providing **smile guarantee.**
![vs braces](https://snazzy.in/images/vsbraces.svg)
79%
more effective vs braces
![vs others](https://snazzy.in/images/vsothers.svg)
38%
more effective vs other aligners
[Book Doctor Consultation](https://snazzy.in/</get-snazzy>)
![doctor](https://snazzy.in/images/doctor.png)
![profile-pic1](https://snazzy.in/images/userpic1.png)
“I was so conscious of my smile and was finally relieved to find a solution that didn’t require those ugly braces.”
![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)
Karishma sharma
![profile-pic2](https://snazzy.in/images/userpic2.png)
“I absolutely loved snazzy. I was a little skeptical if I would get the results that they promised but they proved me wrong.”
![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)
Akash D Prabhu
![](https://snazzy.in/images/faster-cheaper.png)
## Faster, Cheaper, Comfier
We use the latest tech such that you see **results in just 6 months.** Our aligners are manufactured in-house, and come at a cost that is **affordable.** Unlike braces, there are no dietary restrictions as they are **removable** and easy to maintain.
2X
faster
3X
cheaper
2X
comfier
[Book 3D Scan](https://snazzy.in/</get-snazzy>)
![profile-pic3](https://snazzy.in/images/userpic3.png)
“It’s super pocket-friendly and efective. So glad I found snazzy!”
![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)
Kushal Mistry
![profile-pic4](https://snazzy.in/images/userpic4.png)
“I always wanted to get aligners but the huge price tag kept me away until I saw snazzy’s prices.”
![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)![star-orange](https://snazzy.in/images/star-orange.svg)

Your smile transformation
![step 1](https://snazzy.in/images/step1.png)
Easy Assessment
An expert dentist will scan your smile & explain the entire treatment to you.
![check-circle](https://snazzy.in/images/check-circle.svg)
Your 3D scan is completed within 30 minutes by an expert.
![check-circle](https://snazzy.in/images/check-circle.svg)
Our expert answers all your questions regarding your smile transformation.
![step 2](https://snazzy.in/images/step2.png)
Visualize your new smile
Get a preview of your new smile created by expert orthodontist.
![check-circle](https://snazzy.in/images/check-circle.svg)
Your smile, adjusted to your health and aesthetic needs. 
![check-circle](https://snazzy.in/images/check-circle.svg)
See your smile transformation even before paying for treatment.
![step 3](https://snazzy.in/images/step3.png)
Receive aligners
We deliver aligners that are ready to use.
![check-circle](https://snazzy.in/images/check-circle.svg)
Be in touch with your personal dentist & get clinic support whenever required. 
![check-circle](https://snazzy.in/images/check-circle.svg)
Keep track of your progress with our remote smile monitoring app. 
![smile](https://snazzy.in/images/Smile.svg)
10,000+ smiles designed
![smile](https://snazzy.in/images/tie.svg)
30+ expert in-house orthodontist & dentists

![smile](https://snazzy.in/images/phone.svg)

Our technology allows us to offer you the best quality and price, and our team of othodontists accompanies you every step of the way.
Designed by orthodontists| Treatment time| Price| Without pain| Remote monitoring  
---|---|---|---|---  
![snazzy logo](https://snazzy.in/images/snazzy-logo-orange.svg)| ![tick](https://snazzy.in/images/tick.svg)| 6 months| ₹| ![tick](https://snazzy.in/images/tick.svg)| ![tick](https://snazzy.in/images/tick.svg)  
Traditional Treatment| ![tick](https://snazzy.in/images/tick.svg)| +12 months| ₹₹| ![cross](https://snazzy.in/images/cross.svg)| ![cross](https://snazzy.in/images/cross.svg)  
Other Aligners| ![cross](https://snazzy.in/images/cross.svg)| +8 months| ₹₹₹| ![cross](https://snazzy.in/images/cross.svg)| ![cross](https://snazzy.in/images/cross.svg)  
starts at
₹ 3,999/month
[Learn More](https://snazzy.in/</pricing>)
![snazzy guarantee](https://snazzy.in/images/snazzy-seal.svg)
Smile guarantee
We vow to get you a great smile and won't back out until you're there. If at any point during treatment, your teeth need further touch up, we'll cover your new aligners at no cost!
Are Snazzy aligners right for you?
Take 30 seconds to answer a few questions, and we’ll help you find out.

generated_description:
### Snazzy: Affordable Smiles for Everyone

#### Overview
Snazzy, founded in 2020, is a pioneering teledentistry platform based in Bengaluru, India, focused on making clear aligners affordable and accessible. As part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, it's built a reputation for breaking down the barriers to effective dental care, specifically for teeth straightening. If you’re looking for a better smile without the hassle of traditional braces, Snazzy might just be your answer. Check them out at [snazzy.in](https://snazzy.in).

#### Mission
Snazzy's mission is straightforward: democratize access to clear aligner treatment in India. By leveraging cutting-edge teledentistry, the company is offering high-quality aligners at a fraction of the typical costs seen in the market.

#### Team and Expertise
With a dedicated team of 40 employees and guidance from Group Partner Michael Seibel, Snazzy is set to transform the dental landscape. The company's success isn’t just numbers on a page; it's about the positive impacts they’re having on real people's lives.

#### Product Offering
- **Clear Aligners**: Invisible, comfortable, and custom-made aligners designed by expert orthodontists.
- **Speed**: Average treatment time is approximately **6 months** with aligners that need to be worn for just **22 hours a day**.
- **Cost-Effective**: Aligners start at an incredibly affordable ₹3,999/month, which is 3X cheaper and 2X faster than traditional braces.

#### Technology Meets Care
Snazzy's aligners are manufactured in-house, ensuring high quality and affordability. The process is also streamlined:
1. **Assessment**: An expert dentist scans your smile.
2. **Visualization**: Get a preview of your new smile.
3. **Delivery**: Aligners are mailed directly to you, with continuous support from your personal dentist via a remote monitoring app.

#### What People Are Saying
Snazzy boasts a stellar rating of **4.9 stars** from satisfied customers. Users like Karishma Sharma and Akash D Prabhu share how relieved they are to find a comfortable, effective alternative to braces.

#### Why Choose Snazzy?
Snazzy is not just another dental solution; it represents a smarter way to achieve your ideal smile. Their services have key advantages:
- **Expert Guidance**: Constant monitoring and support from dental professionals.
- **Smile Guarantee**: If further adjustments are needed, Snazzy covers the cost of new aligners.
- **Convenience**: Removable aligners mean no dietary restrictions—eat what you love without worry!

#### Join the Movement
Reflecting modern needs and aesthetics, Snazzy is on a mission to ensure that everyone can access the smile they’ve always wanted, and for that, they’re continuously looking to expand and improve. Interested in being part of this smile revolution? [Book a scan](https://snazzy.in/get-snazzy) or refer a friend and both of you can receive rewards.

Snazzy isn’t just about teeth; it's about empowering individuals to embrace their best smiles affordably and comfortably.
